editedFacts.appliances: Dryer, Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range / Oven, Microwave, Garbage disposal, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription:
Beautiful 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath 1,839 square foot home in Big Thompson Creek neighborhood at 56th & Pine Lake Road. This home is spacious with 1839 sq. ft finished on the main and 2nd floor and a full professionally 1,000 sq. ft. finished basement along with a 3 car garage. Close to neighborhood park, shopping and fitness facilities you will want to call this one Home! This home will be only 6 blocks away from the new LPS elementary school to be opened in fall of 2016 and close to the new middle school coming in fall of 2017.
This home features a cathedral ceiling in the great room and focal point gas fireplace. There is a convenient first floor office that has a closet and could be used as another bedroom. There are beautiful oak floors in the kitchen and dining room. The kitchen is nicely appointed with a center island, pantry and stainless steel appliances.
Along with the master bedroom with master bath and walk-in closet, there are two more nice sized bedrooms on the 2nd floor and an additional bedroom in the basement. All bedrooms have large closets. The oversized three stall garage has plenty of space for all of your toys. The walkout basement features a family room, bedroom, bathroom and craft/hobby/computer room.
No showings until after March 5th.
